spec_data.Name: libNX_Xrandr
spec_data.Description:
The X Resize, Rotate and Reflect Extension (RandR) allows clients to
dynamically change X screens, so as to resize, to change the
orientation and layout of the root window of a screen.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 04 Aug 2017 09:08:48 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: NX Resize, Rotate and Reflection extension library
